title: St. Patricks Weekend, Pastors, LA Lakers and more.
itunes:title: St. Patricks Weekend, Pastors, LA Lakers and more.
description:
St. Patrick's Day Weekend has passed and it is Monday.  The crew are using phrases that might not be appropriate.  Church Complaints is in and they talk about Gucci, Floyd Mayweather, Gayle King and more.  Whoopi Goldberg is recovering from pneumonia.  Jussie Smollett may have to take a plea bargain.  It is confirmed that actress Rosario Dawson is dating New Jersey Senator Cory Booker.  The shooting suspect in New Zealand mentions Donald Trump as a symbol of renewed white identity.  A Connecticut woman resigns from her job at the school district after her racist tirade went viral.  The Lakers may not have been the best move for Bron Bron according to Steve.  Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve is talking about becoming the person that he should have been and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
